about_the_game:
CaliaQuest is an erotic hypnosis roleplaying game where you are the brave hero, on a quest for the Princess. Can you make it through six chapters full of branching paths, monster girls, and seductive women and complete your quest, or will you fall along the way into the wonderful and enchanting spell of some gorgeous creature.

The game is a bit like Dungeons and Dragons. You use a D20 die to battle against the whim and will of the creatures you encounter, but instead of attacking you, they all want to hypnotize and seduce you! This is the hypnosis RPG that can put you into a trance as you play, and turn you into the love slave of a witch, or the mindless thrall of a vampire!

So grab your dice, or your favourite dice app, your pen and pad, and join me for an erotic adventure into high fantasy roleplay! I play lots of characters with lots of different voices, and I know you’ll find a favourite among them… and maybe lose to her.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features erotic hypnosis, and sexually-themed fantasy roleplay, and as such is for adults only.

detailed_description:
CaliaQuest is an erotic hypnosis roleplaying game where you are the brave hero, on a quest for the Princess. Can you make it through six chapters full of branching paths, monster girls, and seductive women and complete your quest, or will you fall along the way into the wonderful and enchanting spell of some gorgeous creature.

The game is a bit like Dungeons and Dragons. You use a D20 die to battle against the whim and will of the creatures you encounter, but instead of attacking you, they all want to hypnotize and seduce you! This is the hypnosis RPG that can put you into a trance as you play, and turn you into the love slave of a witch, or the mindless thrall of a vampire!

So grab your dice, or your favourite dice app, your pen and pad, and join me for an erotic adventure into high fantasy roleplay! I play lots of characters with lots of different voices, and I know you’ll find a favourite among them… and maybe lose to her.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Requires sound
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Requires sound - good quality headphones

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.10+ (OS X Yosemite)
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Requires sound
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Version: 10.15+ (OS X Catalina)
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Requires sound - good quality headphones

name: CaliaQuest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Requires sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Requires sound - good quality headphones

short_description: CaliaQuest is an erotic hypnosis roleplaying game where you are the brave hero, on a quest for the Princess. Can you make it through six chapters full of branching paths, monster girls, and seductive women and complete your quest, or will you fall in love along the way?
